CustomField.description: ** For Package Item for Item Classes only ** Identifies the maximum quantity of a single Item that can be selected when selecting Items from this Item Class. Defaults 0. The value of 0 is infinite.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** For Package Item for Item Classes only ** Identifies the maximum quantity of a single Item that can be selected when selecting Items from this Item Class. Defaults 0. The value of 0 is infinite.
CustomField.label: Maximum Quantity Per Item
